Wisdom: الْأَمَلُ أَبَداً فِي تَكْذِيبٍ وَطُولُ الْحَيَاةِ لِلْمَرْءِ تَعْذِيبٌ
enWisdom: Hope is always in denial; and long life is an affliction for man

Wisdom: اتَّقُوا بَاطِلَ الْأَمَلِ فَرُبَّ مُسْتَقْبِلِ يَوْمٍ لَيْسَ بِمُسْتَدْبِرِهِ وَمَغْبُوطٍ فِي أَوَّلِ لَيْلَةٍ قَامَتْ بَوَاكِيهِ فِي آخِرِهِ
enWisdom: Be wary of vain hopes, as it is possible for one who starts a day not to end it and for one who is deemed fortunate at dusk to be mourned at dawn
Where will the falsehoods of hopes mislead you to?!
The most delusive thing is hope
Many a frustrated hope is brought about by a false aspiration

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ كَذَّبَ مُنَاهُ وَأَخْرَبَ دُنْيَاهُ لِعِمَارَةِ أُخْرَاهُ
enWisdom: Blessed is he who belies his aspirations and sacrifices his world in order to build his Hereafter

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنِ اسْتَشْعَرَ الْوَجَلَ وَكَذَّبَ الْأَمَلَ وَتَجَنَّبَ الزَّلَلَ
enWisdom: Blessed be the one who fills himself with fear [of Allah], belies [false] hopes and eschews missteps
Rarely do hopes turn out to be true

Wisdom: مَنْ أَمَّلَ غَيْرَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَكْذَبَ آمَالَهُ
enWisdom: One who hopes for anything other than Allah, the Glorified, has given lie to his hopes
Nothing is more untrue than hope

Wisdom: غَرَّ جَهُولًا كَاذِبُ أَمَلِهِ فَفَاتَهُ حُسْنُ عَمَلِهِ
enWisdom: An ignorant person is fooled by the deception of his hope, so he loses the best of his actions
